sentences.english: See our nice selection of wrought iron decor for your living environment.
sentences.chinese: 看到我們的好選擇鍛鐵裝飾您的生活環境。

sentences.english: It was a small round, weathered, wrought-iron table.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個小圓，風化，鍛鐵表。

sentences.english: A mass of wrought iron ready for further working.
sentences.chinese: 鍛鐵塊準備作進一步加工的熟鐵。

sentences.english: When you think of Victorian elegance, wrought iron comes to mind.
sentences.chinese: 當你想到維多利亞優雅，鍛鐵想到的。
